name: Autobus Park Sim
description:
Autobus Park Sim is an exciting game that will put your parking skills to the test as you learn to park a passenger bus correctly.

Your mission is to find the necessary parking space within a limited time and perform a correct parking maneuver, whether it's a lateral or perpendicular park. You'll need to use the correct camera angle to help you park with precision.

To succeed in Autobus Park Sim, you'll need to be patient and precise, taking your time to carefully maneuver the bus into position. You'll also need to use the correct camera angle to get a clear view of your surroundings and ensure that you don't hit any obstacles or other vehicles.

Autobus Park Sim is a game that requires precision, patience, and a steady hand. Can you park the passenger bus correctly and beat the clock? Download the game now and find out!

Game features :
- More than 100 levels
- Different camera angles
- Limited time for parking
